QuestData.Title: Symbolic Destruction
QuestData.Description:
The cultists that follow this dark legion befoul our lands with symbols of the tyrants they follow.
Their mindless followers flock to these banners, worshipping them as unholy idols.
Burn them down, and cleanse their taint from our lands.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy $1oa Banners of the Black Empire in Uldum.

Objectives.Objective: Banner of the Black Empire destroyed
